attributes.action: charge a road use tax to persons driving onto UK from sea transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A system as that used in Switzerland, but levying a charge for vehicles not taxed in UK

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "charge a road use tax to persons driving onto UK from sea transport."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11421.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Road-visitor-Tax/
